Title: TYPO3 frontend login vulnerable to Session Fixation
Description: It has been discovered that TYPO3 is susceptible to session fixation. If a user authenticates while anonymous session data is present, the session id is not changed. This makes it possible for attackers to generate a valid session id, trick users into using this session id (e.g. by leveraging a different Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability) and then maybe getting access to an authenticated session.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.14, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.3.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.14 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.3.1
